analysis.key_quote: I believe the reclassification of the civil service employees who participate in the development of funding announcements and oversee the review of grant applications as Schedule F would politicize the NIH reduce public trust in Federally-funded science and reduce our ability to identify future cures for diseases that impact all Americans, regardless of political ideology.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern that the proposed rule would politicize the NIH and undermine public trust in science, indicating a clear opposition to the rule's implementation.
